featured.text: Mr. Wang’s arguments were very , and the committee finally accepted his proposal.
Since I do not fully understand your proposal, I am not in the position to make any on it.
The proposal Mr. Lin ______ last week has very little chance of being accepted by the committee.
Nine proposals were submitted, and the Irish-born architect James Hoban won the gold medal for his practical and handsome design.

other.text: The young engineer swore that he had never heard the proposal made and rejected.
The boss then laughingly pointed out that the same proposal had been made and 34 some minutes before.

definition.en_def: A formal suggestion or plan put forward for consideration or discussion.
definition.example: She submitted a proposal for a new community project.
